content.text:
Hey guys!
I'm Claudia, Samantha´s best friend.
I'm super busy because we're organizing a surprise birthday party for her.
This is her 14th birthday, and she is really excited even though she thinks she is not having a party.
The party is next Friday, and we're making sure everything is perfect.
Samantha's sister is decorating the living room with colorful balloons.


I'm baking a delicious chocolate cake, she loves chocolate!
Sergio and Teresa are buying some snacks and sodas.
Ivonne is preparing hotdogs and tuna sandwiches.
After blowing birthday candles Lucy is planning an outdoor movie night, she is setting a big screen and projector in her backyard.
Mary, Samantha´s mother, is fixing a spa day. She is setting a big table and arranging facial masks, cleansers, moisturizers, manicures, and soothing activities, we are having aromatherapy using essential oils and candles to create a calming atmosphere.
Rico is taking the pictures of the party, he is creating a photo booth area with props and backdrops for guests to capture wonderful memories.
I can't wait to see the look on Samantha's face when she walks into the surprise party!
We want this party to be unforgettable!
